class KerasPipeline[source]

KerasPipeline() :: ABC

Scafolding for a model building pipeline.

This base class will contain scafolding for all pipelines used. The goal of this base class is mainly to add safeguard and assumption enforcement.

{% endraw %}

Using High Level APIs

Using tf.keras Functional API

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HighLevelKerasPipeline[source]

HighLevelKerasPipeline() :: KerasPipeline

Scafolding for a model building pipeline.

This base class will contain scafolding for all pipelines used. The goal of this base class is mainly to add safeguard and assumption enforcement.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
pipeline_1 = HighLevelKerasPipeline()
pipeline_1()
